text: itan pinnarum, evarkal iman kontu, tam uraitturantu, unkalutan cerntu (mahkkattirkakap) por purikinrarkalo, avarkalum unkalai cerntavarkale. Innum allahvin vetavitippati unkal uravinarkale. Oruvar marroruvarukku mika nerukkamutaiyavarkalum avarkal - niccayamaka allah ellap porutkalaiyum nankarintavanaka irukkinran
